item.title: vROps 6.1 whats new?
item.description: So vROps 6.1 has gone GA! What have the guys at VMware added? I have listed what I consider the hi-lights below The maximum of 8 nodes has been doubled to 16! SSO integration has been added (requires vSphere 6.0) **Support for SRM has been added ** vRealize Hyperic functionality has been added
